name: .HELPCFG File Extension
summary: Learn about .HELPCFG files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: HELPCFG files are not meant to be opened. Editing a HELPCFG file may cause the Help features included in your Adobe applications to break.
That said, if you want to open a HELPCFG file and examine its text, you can do so in any text editor.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
